messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] just relax
messages.msgSnippet: ... Oh, Linda, I am right there with you! Its so easy to forget what your own dreams are when you spend so much time doing for every one else.The book Simple
messages.messageBody:
>My heart says FREEDOM; my mind is at WAR and full
>of judgement when we do not have STUCTURE and CONTROL.
>
>I need to paste RELAX AND TRUST on my forehead, both for my ds AND for me
>and my process too. And I really need your support right now too...so thank
>you. Linda

Oh, Linda, I am right there with you! Its so easy to forget what your own
dreams are when you spend so much time doing for every one else.The book
Simple Abundance is good for this stuff-it really inspired me. When I was
pregnant with Jenny I made a list of all these things I wanted to do while I
wasn't working as much, but I bet I haven't done any of them in 3 years. I
do remember that learning to play the piano was one of them, and I just got
one, so that is pretty likely to happen now! I think I will make another
list.

Maybe we should both make one, and then we can support each other to stay
with it, and to take the time for ourselves to find our own passions.

Cathie

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] just relax
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 8/28/2000 7:23:25 PM Pacific Daylight Time, ... thank ... See, I tell ya...boredom leads to ACTION and action leads to LEARNING.  The human
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 8/28/2000 7:23:25 PM Pacific Daylight Time,
starshine_lal@... writes:

>
> I need to paste RELAX AND TRUST on my forehead, both for my ds AND for me
> and my process too. And I really need your support right now too...so
thank
> you. Linda
> _

See, I tell ya...boredom leads to ACTION and action leads to LEARNING. The
human animal simply cannot stay still for any length of time. We are
programmed to be actively doing SOMETHING. That very drive leads us to find
solutions.

Hang in there. You're making progress!

Eiraul
